General.Name: Shinsegae
General.Description: SHINSEGAE Inc. operates department stores in South Korea. It operates its department stores under the Shinsegae name. The company also manufactures and retails clothing and furniture; manufactures, retails, and distributes cosmetics; produces and supplies broadcast programs; leases real estate properties; offers advisory services; operates passenger terminal; and engages in the information and communication business. SHINSEGAE Inc. was incorporated in 1955 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
